name: DRIFTING
description:
I feel bored about the life on the land, which is calm and peaceful like death.
Life on the sea is more attracting to me.
It always pushes me to change, explore and, most importantly, survive.
I don't have to find an aim for this drifting life or the life itself is the aim since it makes me feel alive.

Use Arrow Key (Left & Right) or A & D to tilt the boat.

Use Space Key to switch waves when the boat arrives at an intersection.

R for restart the drifting.

Buoys are bad, bottles are good.

Don't let the boat sink.

Programmer | Victor Li

Artist | Neo Li
